name: Mini's Magic World (itch)
description:
After the Tower of Magic is taken over by an evil wizard, it's up to you – a young learner of magic – to save the world and restore order. Run and jump through forest, candyland and desert worlds, during the day and at night. Collect coins, fight monsters, face challenging bosses and live through this amazing side-scrolling adventure in more than 60 colorful platform game levels.

Features:

+ 6 worlds with over 60 carefully designed levels

+ 6 music platformer levels

+ 12 time challenges

+ 8 unique characters

+ local coop multiplayer mode
